elements.title: Transport decarbonisation plan
elements.description: Plan to decarbonise the entire transport system in the UK. Widely reported in the news: from [Edie](https://www.edie.net/news/11/-Clarity-and-confidence-for-the-road-ahead---Green-economy-reacts-to-new-Transport-Decarbonisation-Plan/), from [UKERC](https://ukerc.ac.uk/news/uk-transport-decarbonisation-plan/)

elements.title: E.ON calls on Government to level-up UK’s low-carbon efforts to achieve net zero
elements.description: In its new report, [‘The Carbon Countdown: Road to 2030’](https://www.eonenergy.com/business/news-and-insights/tomorrow-is-on/accelerating-towards-a-net-zero-future.html), E.ON explores the key areas where the UK must move faster and with greater focus in this decade if it intends to meet its 2050 carbon goals.

elements.title: Energy white paper: Powering our net zero future
elements.description: Energy white paper setting out how the UK will clean up its energy system and reach net zero emissions by 2050.
